[DQC.US.0081.9278] The line item concept us-gaap:ConvertibleNotesPayableCurrent with a value of 459,398 and a calculation parent of us-gaap:LiabilitiesCurrent is represented as a sibling of us-gaap:NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent with a value of 0 in the extension taxonomy role 0000002 - Statement - Consolidated Balance Sheets, but us-gaap:ConvertibleNotesPayableCurrent is represented as a descendent of us-gaap:NotesAndLoansPayableCurrent in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomies. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for these two line item concepts.
